refnamediv.refpurpose: Sections for the various DVB specifications

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_nit ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstMpegtsNIT contained in the section .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsNIT contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_from_nit ()
refsect2.para: Ownership of nit is taken. The data in nit is managed by the GstMpegtsSection

entry.para: a GstMpegtsNIT to create the GstMpegtsSection from.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_bat ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstMpegtsBAT contained in the section .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsBAT contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_sdt ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstMpegtsSDT contained in the section .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsSDT contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_from_sdt ()
refsect2.para: Ownership of sdt is taken. The data in sdt is managed by the GstMpegtsSection

entry.para: a GstMpegtsSDT to create the GstMpegtsSection from.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_eit ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstMpegtsEIT contained in the section .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsEIT contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_tdt ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstDateTime of the TDT

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstDateTime contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened. Release with gst_date_time_unref when done.

refsect2.title: gst_mpegts_section_get_tot ()
refsect2.para: Returns the GstMpegtsTOT contained in the section .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The GstMpegtsTOT contained in the section, or NULL if an error happened.

refsect2.title: enum GstMpegtsSectionDVBTableID
refsect2.para: These are the registered DVB table_id variants.

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsNIT

entry.para: Whether this NIT corresponds to the actual stream
ID of the network that this NIT describes

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsNITStream
struct GstMpegtsBATStream
struct GstMpegtsSDT

entry.para: Network ID of the originating delivery system
True if the table describes this transport stream

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsSDTService

entry.para: The program number this table belongs to
EIT schedule information is present in this transport stream
EIT present/following information is present in this transport stream
True if one or more streams is controlled by a CA system

refsect2.title: struct GstMpegtsEIT
struct GstMpegtsEITEvent
enum GstMpegtsRunningStatus
refsect2.para: Corresponds to table 6 of ETSI EN 300 468 (v1.13.0)
